column78: "dc.description": "The present invention relates to a method for allocating radio resources to a transmitting terminal for performing direct communication transmission over a direct link connection. The transmitting terminal receives the system information broadcast from the base station
column79: the system information broadcast includes information on the temporary transmitted radio resource pool indicating the radio resources for performing the direct communication transmission
column80: and the temporary radio resource pool is transmitted by the transmitting terminal And configuration information for the resource pool to limit the amount of time available."

column227: "dc.description": "The present invention relates to a transmitting terminal for transmitting data to a receiving terminal via a direct link connection. The transmitting terminal includes a receiving unit for receiving from the base station a timing command for adjusting an uplink transmission timing value for transmitting data to the base station. The generating unit generates direct link timing information based on the uplink transmission timing value and the direct link timing information is usable to generate a direct link transmission timing value for determining timing to transmit data over the direct link. The transmitting unit sends the generated direct link timing information to the receiving terminal and the direct link timing information is used to generate a direct link receiving timing value for determining the timing of receiving the data to be received directly on the link from the transmitting terminal It is available at the receiving terminal."
